Articles.Content: Hello people, just registered and decided to post a picture of my first worthy looking space station I just got putting together. One of the most cool things I found is that it can turn/move around with the RCS thrusts with no noticeable wobble. I did use MechJeb to get it at a circularized orbit as well as launching at right times to be able to dock without too many worries.

Firstly, welcome to the forums! I think your station looks excellent. Now that mechjeb has shown you how to dock, you should try to master it yourself. It really is a great skill to learn and will open doors for you. great station, and keep up to good work!

Great job! Station looks really cool!

Been playing KSP for about half a year, and haven't. Docked. One. Single. TIME!!!
I used MechJeb only to launch at right times, but did the docking my self since MJ cant dock 2 port at the same time
